name: Universe Balancing Bureau
description: Universe Balancing Bureau is a mini puzzle game in space where you wire up planetary systems and space stations.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Windows 8 / Windows 10 Processor: 1.7+ Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
